author: entertainment.ie
title: MovieNews | The trailer for the star heavy Coen Brother's comedy Hail, Caeser is a blast
text:
It's a well known fact in Hollywood that the vast majority of thespians there would sell a kidney to be in a Coen Brother's film.
Why? Well... Fargo, Miller's Crossing, Old Country For Old Men... we could go on.
Anyhow, their latest seems firmly in the mad cap comedy sub genre they've very much mastered. The cast is pretty incredible - George Clooney, Channing Tatum, Ralph Fiennes Scarlet Johansson, Jonah Hill, with Josh Brolin our lead - while eh, Christopher Lambert and Dolph Lundgren also appear.
You'll get to see this one come next February.
